    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        private void initialise()
        Initialise the program by creating the 3 hotels in the L4 chain - a 3, 4, and 5 star hotel. Write the details of these hotels to the L4 CSV file

      • run

        void run()
        Run the program

      • getOptions

        private java.lang.Object getOptions(java.lang.Object[] options)
        Create letters starting from A for the users of the system to choose as options
        Parameters:
        options - the possible options for the user to choose
        Returns:
        the letter chosen from the options

      • makeReservation

        private void makeReservation(Customer customer,
                             boolean AP)
        Make a reservation. Includes getting all reservation details and writing them to the reservations CSV file
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer making the reservation
        AP - whether the booking is an advanced purchase booking or not

      • makeCancellation

        private void makeCancellation()
        Make a cancellation. Removes the reservation from the reservations CSV file and moves it to the Cancellations CSV file
